mapper.sql: join zhenghe_departments as dept on a.departments_id=dept.id join zhenghe_hospital as h on a.hospital_id=h.id join zhenghe_provincial as p on h.provincial_id=p.id join zhenghe_city as c on h.city_id=c.id join zhenghe_district as d on h.district_id=d.id join zhenghe_profession as j on a.job_title=j.id

a.id, a.avatar, a.doctor_name as doctor, (select dd.departments_name from zhenghe_departments as dd where id=dept.s_departments_id) as department, a.intro, j.profession as professional, h.hospital_name as hospital, a.professional_field as professionalField

a.id AS "id", a.hospital_id AS "hospitalId", a.doctor_name AS "doctorName", a.gender AS "gender", a.departments_id AS "departmentsId", a.avatar AS "avatar", a.intro AS "intro", a.professional_field AS "professionalField", a.job_title AS "jobTitle", a.phone AS "phone", a.password AS "password", a.status AS "status", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.type AS "type", a.wm_url AS "wmUrl", a.standby1 AS "standby1", a.standby2 AS "standby2", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator", a.rank AS "rank"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zhenghe_doctor a
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.rank ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_doctor( id, hospital_id, doctor_name, gender, departments_id, avatar, intro, professional_field, job_title, phone, password, status, create_date, type, wm_url, standby1, standby2, delete_mark, remark, update_date, mender, creator, rank ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{hospitalId}, #{doctorName}, #{gender}, #{departmentsId}, #{avatar}, #{intro}, #{professionalField}, #{jobTitle}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{type}, #{wmUrl}, #{standby1}, #{standby2}, #{deleteMark}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{mender}, #{creator}, #{rank} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zhenghe_doctor SET hospital_id = #{hospitalId}, doctor_name = #{doctorName}, gender = #{gender}, departments_id = #{departmentsId}, avatar = #{avatar}, intro = #{intro}, professional_field = #{professionalField}, job_title = #{jobTitle}, phone = #{phone}, status = #{status}, type = #{type}, remark = #{remark}, password = #{password}, rank = #{rank} WHERE id = #{id}
